E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 6/28/1990
Subject: Progress of Kevin Young
Dear Sir,
Kevin Young has an AVG of .284 at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 7/16/1990
Subject: Progress of Richie Lewis
Dear Sir,
Richie Lewis is doing pretty good at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
He has an ERA of 3.97, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 8/21/1990
Subject: Progress of Dave Fleming
Dear Sir,
Dave Fleming has nothing more to prove at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
He has an ERA of 3.92 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 10/3/1990
Subject: Well...
I am rather upset that I do not play regularly.
I wish to be traded if that doesn't change!

Regards,
Bill Schroeder
